name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some netizens have discovered that Hu Xijin's multiple social media accounts have not been updated since the 27th. There are rumors on Weibo that Hu Xijin has been banned.
At the same time, Hu Xijin's article interpreting the Third Plenary Session of the 18th CPC Central Committee was deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
One more thing to add
Currently, many Weibo bloggers regard the blocking of Hu Xijin’s topic as evidence
But in fact, Hu Xijin’s topic was already blocked last year

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 29, Venezuela. After President Nicolas Maduro won the election, he was questioned about electoral fraud, which triggered a large number of people in the country to take to the streets to protest. They shouted "It's going to fall" and marched to the city center, burning Maduro's propaganda portraits and toppling Hugo Chavez's statues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Around 5 p.m. local time, Chavista paramilitaries opened fire on protesters in downtown Caracas.
But some protesters did not back down, using steel plates and cars as cover and continuing to advance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Coro, Falcon State, people burned a National Guard VN-4 bomb-proof vehicle

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Protesters on the Pan-American Highway in Carrizal

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Photo of the Day: Smash That Dictator

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People used vehicles as cover to avoid bullets and moved forward

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, Venezuela announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Argentina, Chile, Costa Rica, Peru, Panama, the Dominican Republic and Uruguay.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Earlier, China congratulated Maduro on his re-election

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Thousands continue to tear down statues of Chavez

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A militiaman fired at people with a semi-automatic weapon

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People shot

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of protesters occupied the road outside the Simon Bolivar International Airport in the capital

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of people beat up a lone policeman and stole his motorcycle. His teammates ignored him and fled.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A group of National Guard troops joined the protesters in the march

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The police fired and retreated, and one of the officers who was alone was attacked by the protesters who chased after him. His teammates also ignored him.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Around 6 p.m., smoke rose in Caracas, the capital of Venezuela.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At 7 p.m., a large number of military and police were stationed outside the Argentine embassy and consulate in Venezuela.
Earlier today, the Argentine government condemned Maduro's election fraud, after which Venezuela announced the severance of diplomatic relations with Argentina.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was added that the reason Venezuelan military and police surrounded the Argentine embassy and consulate was because opposition leaders Maria Corina Machado and Edmundo González were currently inside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Opposition leader Maria Corina Machado said at a press conference that they confirmed they had won the election after counting 73.2% of the votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: 7:26 p.m. People in Caracas sing the national anthem and beat drums in support of the protesters

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A large number of people came to the Argentine embassy and consulate to show their support

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Opposition leaders were encouraged by the crowds of people who showed up outside the embassy to show their support.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Venezuelan media EVTV said opposition candidate Edmundo Gonzalez received 6,275,182 votes, while Maduro received 2,759,256 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At night, Venezuelans toppled statues of dictator Chavez one after another

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Another statue of dictator Chavez toppled

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some polling stations began announcing their own vote counts due to distrust of the National Electoral Council. In this polling station, Maduro received 158 votes and Edmundo González received 966 votes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Venezuelans drag head and body of dictator Chavez statue in parade

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Argentina's foreign minister expressed gratitude to the Venezuelan people who gathered outside the embassy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some police officers refused to suppress the people and took off their uniforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At this moment, on the streets of Caracas

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Residents tear down a huge portrait of Chavez from the wall of the government office in La Guaira

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Barcelona, Anzoátegui, the National Guard and the State Police give up their crackdown and hand over weapons and shields to demonstrators

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People burned huge propaganda banners of Maduro.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 28, Luzhou, Sichuan. A woman posted a video saying that her mother is almost 80 years old. The social security is only 135 yuan per month, and it is getting less and less every year.
"My mother is almost 80 years old and has no minimum living allowance. Many of her children have medical insurance, but why doesn't my mother have a minimum living allowance?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Changsha, Hunan. Homeowners of Best Cloud Community complained that the building was shoddy, with mold, cracks, and water leaks appearing in the community after just a few days of rain. On the 21st, the sales office even closed the door to prevent the owners from entering to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Water conditions in Mentougou, Beijing on July 30.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 29, in Qinzhou, Guangxi, several security guards in Tianhe Mansion beat up a food delivery man. An informed owner said: The property management prohibited food delivery vehicles from entering, and the food delivery man was taken away by an ambulance.
